title: Python Application using Flask
features: Designed and deployed a scalable Flask-based web service integrating Streamlit dashboards and MongoDB persistence, reducing data retrieval latency by 30%
Implemented secure RESTful APIs with Flask, leveraging PyMongo for efficient CRUD operations, and automated deployment pipelines using Docker and CI/CD tools
Architected real-time data visualization modules in Streamlit, enabling interactive analytics for end-users and improving decision-making speed by 25%
